result.execSummary:
The defendant Ian T McGee was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse Assessments], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.descr: House of Correction - Imposed and Stayed

supervisions.notes: Court does not object to discharge after 12 months if all conditions have been completed.

miscConds.notes:
*Pay all applicable costs and surcharges, including mandatory surcharges and supervision fees as determined by DOC. Court found Domestic Abuse surcharge is applicable. DNA surcharge is waived as no sample was taken. Any amount remaining due and owing is subject to civil judgment and/or tax intercept or other means.
*Pay all supervision fees as determined by the DOC.

*No firearms; weapons.
*Court advised defendant of penalties for violating the no contact order and due to this DV conviction s/he may never possess firearms or ammunition.

*NO controlled substances without valid prescription.
*NO contact with victim, unless the victim requests contact, and then only after the Court has approved a modification to no violent contact.

*Successfully complete "Batterers Intervention" counseling.
*Successfully complete any other counseling and/or treatment deemed appropriate.
*Participate in Alcohol and Drug  Assessment and successfully complete recommended treatment including random urine screens.

timeConds.notes: *Time is stayed pending a review hearing on 10/23/15 at 1:30, Branch 40.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Ian T McGee

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.
Notice of court ordered financial obligations

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Ian T McGee in court.  Patrick D. Winter appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.  
Probation Agent is in court.  Probation Status Review report filed and reviewed.  Defendant is compliant or mostly compliant with probation.  The remaining condition time is stayed.  Court found that further review is not needed.
Request for payment of $34  witness fees for witness Sarah E.D. processed and forwarded to the Treasurer's Office on check request x26211707 in court 2x on 6/17/15 & 4/27/15.

Defendant Ian T McGee in court with attorney Edward Lee Wright.  Sarra Mae Kiaie appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.  
Court found the state has satisfied victims' rights law.  Sentencing proceeded.  Statements by the State, defense and defendant. Defendant sentenced to serve 7 months in the House of Correction with credit for 0 days time served.  COURT STAYED THE SENTENCE and placed the defendant on probation with the State of Wisconsin, Department of Corrections for a period of 18 months.
CONDITIONS OF PROBATION:
-As a condition of probation, the Court ordered the defendant to serve 30 days in the House of Correction.  This time is stayed pending a review on 10/23/15.
-Court does not object to discharge after 12 months if all conditions have been completed.       
-Successfully complete "Batterers intervention" counseling.
-Defendant to participate in Alcohol and Drug Assessment and successfully complete recommended treatment including random urine screens.
-No controlled substances without a valid prescription.
-Successfully complete any other counseling and/or treatment deemed appropriate.
-No contact with victim, UNLESS the victim requests contact, and then only after the Court has approved a modification to no violent contact.
-Defendant to pay all applicable costs and surcharges of this case, including any applicable mandatory surcharges and supervision fees as determined by the Department of Corrections.  Court found the Domestic Abuse surcharge is applicable. Court waived the DNA surcharge as no DNA sample was taken.  Any amount remaining due and owing is subject to civil judgment and/or tax intercept or other means.
-Defendant to pay all supervision fees as determined by the Department of Corrections.
-Obtain and maintain employment.
-No firearms; weapons.
Received and filed: Pretrial Sentence Credit, Notice of Right to Seek Post-Conviction Relief, Memorandum of Conditions of Probation.  Court advised defendant of penalties for violating the no contact order and due to this DV conviction s/he may never possess firearms or ammunition.  Case adjourned to Branch 40.  Probation Review Hearing scheduled for October 23, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Ian T McGee in court with attorney Edward Lee Wright.  Kristin M. Schrank appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.  
Defendant was advised of constitutional rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights, and plead GUILTY.  Defendant examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum received and filed.  Stipulation by parties to complaint as a factual basis to sustain the plea.  Defendant further advised that if he/she is not a US citizen, deportation is possible.  Court found the defendant guilty. Judgment of conviction entered.  Court ordered case adjourned for sentencing in Branch 40.  Court advised defendant that the no contact order remains in effect.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for July 14, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Ian T McGee in court with attorney Edward Lee Wright.  Sarra Mae Kiaie appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case in court for Jury Trial. For reasons stated on the record, Court granted Defense motion for new jury trial date. Court advised defendant that the no contact order remains in effect.  Jury trial scheduled for June 17, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Ian T McGee in court with attorney Edward Lee Wright.  William T. Berens appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.  
Final Pretrial held.  On motion of the state, Court ordered 15CM84 and 15CM396 joined for the purpose of trial.  Case remains set for jury trial on 4/27/15 in Branch 40.  Court reminds defendant the no contact order remains in effect.

Defendant Ian T McGee in court with attorney Edward Lee Wright.  Kristin M. Schrank appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.  
Status Conference held.  Case is adjourned to Branch 40.  Court advised defendant that the no contact order remains in effect.  Final pre-trial scheduled for April 16, 2015 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for April 27, 2015 at 08:30 am.

DEFENDANT WAS ORDERED BY THE COURT TO REPORT TO THE MILWAUKEE COUNTY JAIL (CJF) TO BE BOOKED AND RELEASED BY 3:00 P.M. ON  (2/7/15). IF THEY FAIL TO APPEAR A BENCH WARRANT WILL BE ISSUED FOR THEIR ARREST.  Status conference scheduled for 02-11-2015 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Ian T McGee
Current: 1826A North 4th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53212   (Effective: 02-06-2015)
Prior: 4947 South Heritage Drive, #204, Greenfield, WI 53220
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Sarah D. or the address of 4947 South Heritage Dr. #204, Greenfield

Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Dallet, Branch 40.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to Defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned for a Status Conference in Branch 40.vb

Defendant Ian T McGee in court with attorney Edward Lee Wright.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Court ordered arrest warrant withdrawn.  Recall issued.
Arrest Warrant received from the D.A.'s office on filing date of Criminal Complaint.
